headline: Franklin Resources to Expand Alternatives Platform With Apera Acquisition
summary: BEN is set to expand its alternatives platform with a majority stake in Apera, boosting global credit AUM to $87 billion.

raw.headline: Franklin Resources to Expand Alternatives Platform With Apera Acquisition
raw.summary: BEN is set to expand its alternatives platform with a majority stake in Apera, boosting global credit AUM to $87 billion.

headline: Franklin's May AUM Balance Rises on Positive Markets and Net Inflows
summary: BEN's AUM rose to $1.57 trillion in May, driven by positive markets and net inflows despite outflows at Western Asset.

raw.headline: Franklin's May AUM Balance Rises on Positive Markets and Net Inflows
raw.summary: BEN's AUM rose to $1.57 trillion in May, driven by positive markets and net inflows despite outflows at Western Asset.

headline: Franklin Templeton to take majority stake in private credit firm Apera
summary: Apera offers senior secured private capital solutions to private equity-backed firms in Western Europe.

raw.headline: Franklin Templeton to take majority stake in private credit firm Apera
raw.summary: Apera offers senior secured private capital solutions to private equity-backed firms in Western Europe.
